Returns the default (current) database name as a string in the utf8 character set. If there is no default database, DATABASE() returns NULL. trans-unit.source: Roles are created with the CREATE ROLE statement, and dropped with the DROP ROLE statement. Roles are then assigned to a user with an extension to the GRANT statement, while privileges are assigned to a role in the regular way with GRANT. Similarly, the REVOKE statement can be used to both revoke a role from a user, or revoke a privilege from a role.
trans-unit.target: 使用CREATE ROLE语句创建角色，并使用DROP ROLE语句删除角色。然后将角色分配给具有GRANT语句扩展名的用户，而特权则通过GRANT定期分配给角色。同样，REVOKE语句可用于从用户撤消角色，或从角色撤消特权。

trans-unit.source: Run test cases with names prefixed with PREFIX or which fulfil the REGEX. For example, --do-test=testa matches tests that begin with testa, --do-test=main.testa matches tests in the main test suite that begin with testa, and --do-test=main.*testa matches test names that contain main followed by testa with anything in between. In the latter case, the pattern match is not anchored to the beginning of the test name, so it also matches names such as xmainytestz.
trans-unit.target: 使用名称以PREFIX开头或满足REGEX的名称运行测试用例。例如，-- --do-test=testa 匹配以testa --do-test=main.testa ，-- do-test = main.testa匹配主测试套件中以testa --do-test=main.*testa ，而--do-test = main。* testa匹配包含main的测试名称，后跟testa以及介于两者之间的任何内容。在后一种情况下，模式匹配不锚定在测试名称的开头，因此它也匹配诸如xmainytestz之类的名称。

trans-unit.source: Run tests in N parallel threads (default 1) Use parallel=auto for auto-setting of N.
trans-unit.target: 在N个并行线程中运行测试(默认为1)使用parallel=auto来自动设置N。

trans-unit.source: Run testsuite in "memory" using tmpfs or ramdisk. This can decrease test times significantly, in particular if you would otherwise be running over a remote file system. Attempts to find a suitable location using a builtin list of standard locations for tmpfs (/dev/shm). The option can also be set using environment variable MTR_MEM=[DIR]. If DIR is given, it is added to the beginning of the list of locations to search, so it takes precedence over any built-in locations. Once you have run tests with --mem within a mysql-testdirectory, a soflink var will have been set up to the temporary directory, and this will be re-used the next time, until the soflink is deleted. Thus, you do not have to repeat the --mem option next time.
trans-unit.target: 使用tmpfs或ramdisk在“内存”中运行测试套件。这可以显着减少测试时间，尤其是如果您要在远程文件系统上运行的话。尝试使用内置的tmpfs（/ dev / shm）标准位置列表来找到合适的位置。也可以使用环境变量MTR_MEM = [DIR]设置该选项。如果指定了DIR，则会将其添加到要搜索的位置列表的开头，因此它优先于任何内置位置。在mysql-test目录中使用--mem运行测试后，将在临时目录中设置soflink var，并且下次将重新使用该目录，直到删除soflink。因此，您下次不必重复 --mem 选项。

trans-unit.source: Running ANALYZE on a different server. ANALYZE TABLE does a full table scan, which can put too much load on the server. It is possible to run ANALYZE on the slave, and then take the data from statistics tables on the slave and apply it on the master.

trans-unit.source: Running EXPLAIN tells you the table order that the Optimizer is very likely to use today. After adding a new INDEX, the optimizer may pick a different table order. You should anticipate the order changing, guess at what order makes the most sense, and build the INDEXes accordingly. Then rerun EXPLAIN to see if the Optimizer's brain was on the same wavelength you were on.
trans-unit.target: 运行EXPLAIN会告诉你优化器今天很可能使用的表顺序。在添加一个新的INDEX后,优化器可能会选择不同的表顺序。你应该预见到顺序的变化,猜测什么顺序最合理,并据此建立INDEX。然后重新运行EXPLAIN,看看优化器的大脑是否和你在同一个波长上。

SELECT * FROM ... WHERE autoincrement_column IS NULL

SELECT ... INTO enables selected columns to be stored directly into variables. No resultset is produced. The query should return a single row. If the query returns no rows, a warning with error code 1329 occurs (No data), and the variable values remain unchanged. If the query returns multiple rows, error 1172 occurs (Result consisted of more than one row). If it is possible that the statement may retrieve multiple rows, you can use LIMIT 1 to limit the result set to a single row.
trans-unit.target: SELECT ... INTO使选定的列直接存储到变量中。没有结果集产生。查询应返回一行。如果查询不返回任何行，则会出现错误代码1329的警告（无数据），并且变量值保持不变。如果查询返回多行，则会出现错误1172（结果包含多于一行）。如果该语句可能检索多行，则可以使用 LIMIT 1 将结果集限制为单行。

trans-unit.target: SQL编辑器、数据库对象编辑器和其他编辑器的行为就像通常的IDE文档一样。

trans-unit.source: SQL Fehler (1939): Engine CONNECT failed to discover table `abc`.`def` with 'CREATE TABLE whatever ...
trans-unit.target: SQL Fehler(1939)。Engine CONNECT用'CREATE TABLE whatever ...'发现表`abc`.`def`失败。

trans-unit.source: SQL Server 2005/2008 will deploy table elimination in this situation as well. We have not found a way to make Oracle 11g use it for this type of query. Queries like these arise in two situations. Either when you have a denormalized model consisting of a fact table with several related dimension tables, or when you have a highly normalized model where each attribute is stored in its own table. The example with the subselect is common whenever you store historized/versioned data.
trans-unit.target: SQL Server 2005/2008也会在这种情况下部署表消除。我们还没有找到让Oracle 11g在这种类型的查询中使用它的方法。像这样的查询出现在两种情况下。要么是当你有一个由一个事实表和几个相关维度表组成的去正常化模型,要么是当你有一个高度正常化的模型,其中每个属性都存储在自己的表中。子选择的例子在存储历史化/版本化数据时很常见。

trans-unit.source: SQL commands for defining data, such as ALTER, CREATE, DROP, RENAME etc.
trans-unit.target: 用于定义数据的SQL命令,如ALTER、CREATE、DROP、RENAME等。

trans-unit.source: SQL commands for querying and manipulating data, such as SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE etc.
trans-unit.target: 用于查询和操作数据的SQL命令,如SELECT、UPDATE、DELETE等。

trans-unit.source: SQL editor with syntax coloring, bookmarks, and text searching
trans-unit.target: 具有语法着色、书签和文本搜索功能的SQL编辑器。

trans-unit.source: SQL editor: possibility to organize all your scripts in folders, reassign database connections for particular scripts.
trans-unit.target: SQL编辑器:可以将所有的脚本组织在文件夹中,为特定的脚本重新分配数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: SQL errors can also be logged in a separate file using the SQL_ERROR_LOG plugin.
trans-unit.target: 还可以使用SQL_ERROR_LOG插件将SQL错误记录在单独的文件中。

trans-unit.source: SQL is generally poor at recursive structures.
